content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>Blacklight</ShortName>   <Description>Blacklight Search</Description>   <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/x-icon">/favicon.ico</Image>   <Contact/>   <Url type="text/html" method="get" template="http://www.agnic.org/catalog?q={searchTerms}&qt=search&per_page=10"/>   <Url type="application/rss+xml" method="get" template="http://www.agnic.org/catalog.rss?q={searchTerms}"/>   <Url type="application/x-suggestions+json" method="get" template="http://www.agnic.org/catalog/opensearch?format=json?q={searchTerms}"/> </OpenSearchDescription>
